CustomField.formula: IF(AND( Infleet_Damage_check_completed__c =true, checkForWinterTires__c=true, Stickers_are_removed__c=true, Max_is_not_exceeded__c =true, OR(AND( Min_is_reached__c =true,Plates_are_removed__c=true), Plates_are_removed__c=false) ), 'Ready', 'Not Ready')
CustomField.label: Defleet Ready Check
